name: Color Gems
description:
Your spaceship is in the middle of an endless asteroid field, but there is an upside - the asteroids are all gemstones!

Your mission is to collect as many gemstones as possible. Be careful though, only gemstones of a similar color as your ship's hull can be collected. Other colors can be collected, but damage the ship.

Features:
+ Sneaky color shifting gems
+ Zen like sound effects
+ A bunch of challenging achievements
+ Competitive leaderboard through Game Center
